1. Right click on the selected versioned item(s) you want to commit in Solution Explorer. An item could be a file directory or project.
2. Select commit from the item menu that pops up.
3. Print a log message in the commit dialog that appears.
A list of the items to be commited is visible in the upper area of the dialog box. If show diff-button is clicked a diff will be displayed. A diff shows the difference between modified (green), removed (red) and unchanged (blue) text.
